lead_paragraph: A former deputy district attorney who has prosecuted sex crimes has been indicted on child pornography charges, the Federal authorities in California said today. A 19-count indictment, filed in Federal District Court here, accused a former Sacramento County deputy district attorney, Pete Harned, of transporting, receiving and possessing child pornography from July 1995 to July 1996.
abstract: Former Sacramento County Deputy District Atty Pete Harned, who has prosecuted sex crimes, is indicted on child pornography charges; case reviewed (S)
